channel.title: How to make Rune Knifes gives range exp and not str?
channel.description:
Hello.
How do we make Rune Knifes gives range exp and not str exp?
,Thanks

item.title: How to make Rune Knifes gives range exp and not str?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

        if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15156) { // replace that id with yours
            PkingDelay = 5;
            wepdelay = 5;
            UseBow = true;
        }

just look for

public boolean UseBow = false

it might be a little diferent in your server.

@owned654321241 wrote:

My guess is that it is somewhere in client.java and you would have to search for the rune knife id (868) and were it gives the skill number 2 (strength) change that to 4 (range).
